title: How to Make Drambuie

steps.headline: Mix the rosemary (about three large pinches) with the whiskey in the bottle.
steps.description: Leave on the side for at least 24 hours to a few days.

steps.headline: Strain the rosemary out of the whiskey.
Mix the honey and the whiskey together in a bowl.
Scoop out mixture and bottle (makes about 1.5 bottles).
Shake every so often, ready to drink in about a day.

text: Mix the rosemary (about three large pinches) with the whiskey in the bottle. Leave on the side for at least 24 hours to a few days. Strain the rosemary out of the whiskey.  Pour honey into a bowl.  Mix the honey and the whiskey together in a bowl.  Scoop out mixture and bottle (makes about 1.5 bottles).  Shake every so often, ready to drink in about a day.
